name: Night of the Pigeon Dead
description:
My team's submission for the 3rd Cartridge Jam.

Controls
Left & right arrows - Move
Z - Mop
X - Swing

Post your highest scores below for brownie points or whatever, maybe there's even a secret prize. (There isn't)

Creators
Ian Eviston, programming. Twitter: @evistian
Markus Woods, visual design. Twitter: @MarkusOWoods
Ewen Wynne, composer.

(Here's little secret between you and me, check out @ThisFineGroup too)
